mapper.update: UPDATE tempregister SET id=#{id}, unit=#{unit}, tmerName=#{tmerName}, minTemp=#{minTemp}, maxTemp=#{maxTemp}, miniScale=#{miniScale}, manufacturer=#{manufacturer}, tmterNo=#{tmterNo}, sampleNo=#{sampleNo}, certificateNo=#{certificateNo}, result=#{result}, createUserID=#{createUserID}, createDate=#{createDate}, id=#{id} WHERE id=#{id}
